trends: There have been no other sightings in Calverton
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: leaving work saw a light in the sky I was watching when I took a picture it shot off and disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsI was just getting back to my shop after work. As I pulled into the parking lot which is next to a field I noticed a light in the sky that was, to me, too big and bright to be a star especially at the time I saw it (a little before 5pm twilight). I got out of my truck and used my phone to take a few pictures and was lucky enough to get them as well as a picture of the trail it left before it shot off and disappeared.Unfortunatly no one was with me
